targets.query:
from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /data_set/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =="data_set_MODBUS00")
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
|> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
|> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
|> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])

from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /data_set/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =="data_set_MODBUS30")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
